title: Five Steps To Not Hating Electric Cars -- AFTER/DRIVE
description:
You love the vicious sounds, smells and excitement of combustion cars. But can you learn to love electric cars the same way? Maybe you can, if you follow these five steps. With Mike Prichinello and Zac Moseley from the Classic Car Club Manhattan.

Classic Car Club
http://www.classiccarclubmanhattan.com/

More /DRIVE on:

http://www.twitter.com/drive
